actions.committee: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to clarify provisions relating to the use of accrued compensatory time by certain public employees.

summary.text: Amends the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to revise requirements relating to the use of accrued compensatory time by public employees of State, local, and interstate governmental agencies. Sets forth additional remedies and sanctions for employer violations of such requirements.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to clarify provisions relating to the use of accrued compensatory time by certain public employees.
